memory_entity_creation.description: Create memory entities with automatic versioning and compression

semantic_search.description: Search memories using semantic similarity with BM25 hybrid
semantic_search.methodology: Execute 100 semantic queries against 10K entity corpus

task_decomposition.methodology: Submit 10 goals of varying complexity, measure average latency
